attributes.action: consider David Milliband to become the next Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has become apparent that the Labour Party is suffering and the PM must consider if he is able to bring the party around to comfortably win the next general election or to consider stepping down as PM and to initiate a new leadership contest for the good of the party and the country. We believe that David Milliband would be a good contender for the contest.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
